Snippet.name: Wizard
Snippet.text: Well done Ollie on making it this far!:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: Wizard
Snippet.text: You're journey is however about to get much harder.:C_:pause:4:C_:end:null

Snippet.name: Mago
Snippet.text: Bien hecho Ollie al llegar hasta aqui!:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: Mago
Snippet.text: Tu viaje está a punto de volverse mucho más difícil.:C_:pause:4:C_:end:null

Snippet.name: phù thủy
Snippet.text: nhưng cuộc hành trình của ngươi sẽ bắt đầu rất khó.:C_:pause:4:C_:end:null

Snippet.name: 巫师
Snippet.text: 做得好,奥利!竟然能来到这里。:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: 巫师
Snippet.text: 但你的旅程正在变得更加艰难。:C_:pause:4:C_:end:null

Snippet.name: ウィザード
Snippet.text: オーリー良くもここまでこれたな。:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: ウィザード
Snippet.text: だが、君の旅はもっと困難になる。:C_:pause:4:C_:end:null
